name: Tia Ballard
content:
Tia Ballard has played hundreds of characters in anime and video games, and has spent her time professionally acting, writing, and directing since 2011. A few of her favorite roles include: Zero Two (Darling in the Franxx), Happy the Cat (Fairy Tail, Edens Zero), Carrot (One Piece), Chiho (Devil is a Part-Timer), Kagura (Fruits Basket), Shuna (That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime), Yashiro Nene (Toilet-Bound Hanako), Mizore (Rosario + Vampire), Itsuki (The Quintessential Quintuplets), Ragdoll of the Wild Wild PussyCats (My Hero Academia), Nanami (Kamisama Kiss), Yue (Arifureta), and Yuu (Bloom into You).

Tia also peppers her life with puppet making (she LOVES ventriloquist dummies. It's a whole thing.), drawing, childrens' book writing, gardening, and is currently producing an animated short! She also loves her dogs Bentley and Tom Hanx.

Instagram: @tbirdlizzy, @tiatoony_art
Twitter: @tiatoony
